text.100: [27] na tena dhammena samatthi ki~nci, idampi dhamme ratana.m  pa.niita.m.
text.104: [27] samaadhinaa tena samo na vijjati, idampi dhamme ratana.m  pa.niita.m.
text.107: [21] ye puggalaa a.t.tha sata.m pasatthaa, cattaari etaani yugaani  honti.
text.108: [27] te dakkhi.neyyaa sugatassa saavakaa, etesu dinnaani  mahapphalaani.
text.109: [22] idampi sa"nghe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi  hotu..
text.111: [21] ye suppayuttaa manasaa da.lhena, nikkaamino  gotamasaasanamhi.
text.112: [27] te pattipattaa amata.m vigayha, laddhaa mudhaa nibbuti.m {nibbuti (ka0)}   bhu~njamaanaa.
text.113: [22] idampi ^a^M0.0006^ea^ sa"nghe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi  hotu..
text.115: [21] yathindakhiilo pathavissito {pa.thavissito (ka0  sii0), pathavi.msito (ka0 si0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} siyaa, catubbhi vaatehi asampakampiyo.
text.116: [27] tathuupama.m sappurisa.m vadaami, yo ^a^T0.0007^ea^ ariyasaccaani avecca  passati.
text.117: [22] idampi sa"nghe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi  hotu..
text.120: [27] ki~ncaapi te honti bhusa.m pamattaa, na te bhava.m  a.t.thamamaadiyanti.
text.121: [22] idampi sa"nghe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi  hotu..
text.123: [21] sahaavassa ^a^P0.0005^ea^ dassanasampadaaya {sahaavasaddassanasampadaaya  (ka0)}, tayassu dhammaa jahitaa bhavanti.
text.124: [22] sakkaayadi.t.thii vicikicchita~nca, siilabbata.m vaapi yadatthi  ki~nci..
text.126: [21] catuuhapaayehi ca vippamutto, chaccaabhi.thaanaani {cha caabhi.thaanaani (sii0  syaa0)} abhabba kaatu.m {abhabbo kaatu.m (sii0)}.
text.127: [22] idampi sa"nghe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi  hotu..
text.129: [21] ki~ncaapi ^a^V0.0007^ea^ so kamma {kamma.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0  pii0)} karoti paapaka.m, kaayena vaacaa uda cetasaa vaa.
text.130: [27] abhabba {abhabbo (bahuusu)} so tassa pa.ticchadaaya {pa.ticchaadaaya (sii0)}, abhabbataa  ^a^T0.0008^ea^ di.t.thapadassa  vuttaa.
text.131: [22] idampi ^a^M0.0007^ea^ sa"nghe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi  hotu..
text.133: [21] vanappagumbe yatha {yathaa (sii0 syaa0)} phussitagge,   gimhaanamaase pa.thamasmi.m {pa.thamasmi (?)} gimhe.
text.134: [27] tathuupama.m dhammavara.m adesayi {adesayii (sii0)}, nibbaanagaami.m parama.m hitaaya.
text.135: [22] idampi buddhe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
text.137: [21] varo vara~n~nuu varado varaaharo, anuttaro dhammavara.m  adesayi.
text.138: [22] idampi buddhe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi hotu..
text.140: [21] khii.na.m puraa.na.m nava natthi sambhava.m, virattacittaayatike  bhavasmi.m.
text.141: [27] te khii.nabiijaa aviruu.lhichandaa, nibbanti dhiiraa  yathaaya.m {yathaya.m (ka0)} padiipo.
text.142: [22] idampi sa"nghe ratana.m pa.niita.m, etena saccena suvatthi  hotu..
text.144: [21] yaaniidha bhuutaani samaagataani, bhummaani ^a^T0.0009^ea^ vaa yaani va  antalikkhe.
text.145: [22] tathaagata.m devamanussapuujita.m, buddha.m namassaama suvatthi hotu..
text.147: [21] yaaniidha bhuutaani samaagataani, bhummaani vaa yaani va  antalikkhe.
text.148: [22] tathaagata.m devamanussapuujita.m, dhamma.m ^a^P0.0006^ea^  namassaama suvatthi hotu..
text.150: [21] yaaniidha ^a^M0.0008^ea^ bhuutaani samaagataani, bhummaani vaa yaani va  antalikkhe.
text.151: [22] tathaagata.m devamanussapuujita.m, sa"ngha.m namassaama suvatthi  hotuuti..
text.159: [22] na ^a^T0.0010^ea^ tesa.m koci sarati, sattaana.m kammapaccayaa..
text.168: [21] cira.m jiivantu no ~naatii, yesa.m hetu labhaamase.
text.169: [22] amhaaka~nca kataa puujaa, daayakaa ca anipphalaa..
text.171: [21] na hi tattha kasi {kasii (sii0)} atthi, gorakkhettha na vijjati.
text.172: [27] va.nijjaa taadisii natthi, hira~n~nena kayokaya.m {kayaakkaya.m (sii0), kayaa kaya.m (syaa0)}.
text.173: [22] ito dinnena yaapenti, petaa kaala"nkataa {kaalakataa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0)} tahi.m..
text.175: [21] unname udaka.m vu.t.tha.m, yathaa ninna.m pavattati.
text.181: [21] adaasi ^a^M0.0009^ea^ ^a^V0.0009^ea^ me akaasi me,   ~naatimittaa {~naati mitto (?)} sakhaa ca me.
text.184: [21] na hi ru.n.na.m vaa soko vaa, yaa ca~n~naa paridevanaa.
text.187: [21] aya~nca kho dakkhi.naa dinnaa, sa"nghamhi suppati.t.thitaa.
text.190: [21] so ~naatidhammo ca aya.m nidassito, petaana puujaa ca  kataa u.laaraa.
text.191: [22] bala~nca bhikkhuunamanuppadinna.m {... manuppadinnavaa (ka0)}, tumhehi pu~n~na.m pasuta.m  anappakanti..
text.196: [22] atthe kicce samuppanne, atthaaya me bhavissati..
text.198: [21] raajato vaa duruttassa, corato pii.litassa vaa.
text.199: [27] i.nassa vaa pamokkhaaya, dubbhikkhe aapadaasu vaa.
text.203: [22] na sabbo sabbadaa eva, tassa ta.m upakappati..
text.205: [21] nidhi vaa .thaanaa cavati, sa~n~naa vaassa vimuyhati.
text.206: [22] naagaa vaa apanaamenti, yakkhaa vaapi haranti na.m..
text.211: [21] yassa ^a^T0.0012^ea^ daanena siilena, sa.myamena damena ca.
text.212: [22] nidhii sunihito hoti, itthiyaa purisassa vaa..
text.214: [21] cetiyamhi ^a^M0.0010^ea^ ca sa"nghe vaa, puggale atithiisu vaa.
text.215: [22] maatari pitari caapi {vaapi (syaa0 ka.m0)}, atho je.t.thamhi bhaatari..
text.221: [22] kayiraatha dhiiro pu~n~naani, yo nidhi anugaamiko..
text.226: [21] suva.n.nataa susarataa, susa.n.thaanaa suruupataa {susa.n.thaanasuruupataa  (sii0), susa.n.thaana.m suruupataa (syaa0 ka.m0)}.
text.232: [21] maanussikaa ca sampatti, devaloke ca yaa rati.
text.235: [21] mittasampadamaagamma, yonisova {yoniso ve (sii0), yoniso ce  (syaa0), yoniso ca (?)} payu~njato.
text.238: [21] pa.tisambhidaa ^a^V0.0011^ea^ vimokkhaa ca, yaa ca saavakapaaramii.
text.247: [22] sakko ujuu ca suhujuu {suujuu (sii0)} ca, suvaco cassa mudu  anatimaanii..
text.249: [21] santussako ^a^M0.0011^ea^ ca subharo ca, appakicco ca sallahukavutti.
text.250: [22] santindriyo ca nipako ca, appagabbho kulesvananugiddho..
text.252: [21] na ca khuddamaacare ki~nci, yena vi~n~nuu pare upavadeyyu.m.
text.253: [22] sukhinova khemino hontu, sabbasattaa {sabbe sattaa (sii0 syaa0)} bhavantu sukhitattaa..
text.255: [21] ye keci paa.nabhuutatthi, tasaa vaa thaavaraa vanavasesaa.
text.256: [22] diighaa vaa yeva mahantaa {mahanta (?)}, majjhimaa rassakaa a.nukathuulaa..
text.258: [21] di.t.thaa vaa yeva adi.t.thaa {adi.t.tha (?)}, ye va {ye ca (sii0 syaa0  ka.m0 pii0)} duure vasanti aviduure.
text.259: [22] bhuutaa va {vaa (syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 ka0)} sambhavesii va {vaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, sabbasattaa bhavantu sukhitattaa..
text.261: [21] na paro para.m nikubbetha, naatima~n~netha katthaci na ka~nci {na.m ka~nci  (sii0 pii0), na.m ki~nci (syaa0), na ki~nci (ka0)}.
text.268: [22] uddha.m adho ca tiriya~nca, asambaadha.m averamasapatta.m..
text.270: [21] ti.t.tha.m cara.m nisinno va {vaa (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)},  sayaano yaavataassa vitamiddho {vigatamiddho (bahuusu)}.
text.274: [22] kaamesu vinaya {vineyya (sii0)} gedha.m, na hi jaatuggabbhaseyya puna retiiti..
text.29: [27] ma.msa.m nhaaru {nahaaru (sii0 pii0), nahaaruu (syaa0 ka.m0)} a.t.thi {a.t.thii (syaa0 ka.m)} a.t.thimi~nja.m vakka.m,
text.31: [27] anta.m antagu.na.m udariya.m kariisa.m matthalu"nga.m {( ) sabbattha natthi, a.t.thakathaa ca  dvatti.msasa"nkhyaa ca manasi kaatabbaa},
text.32: [26] pitta.m semha.m pubbo lohita.m sedo medo,
text.33: [22] assu vasaa khe.lo si"nghaa.nikaa lasikaa muttanti {mutta.m, matthake matthalu"nganti (syaa0)}..
text.49: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V0.0004^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m  viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha kho a~n~nataraa  devataa abhikkantaaya rattiyaa abhikkantava.n.naa kevalakappa.m jetavana.m  obhaasetvaa yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m  abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m a.t.thaasi. ekamanta.m .thitaa kho saa devataa  bhagavanta.m gaathaaya ajjhabhaasi --
text.55: [22] puujaa ca puujaneyyaana.m {puujaniiyaana.m (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)}, eta.m ma"ngalamuttama.m..
text.61: [22] subhaasitaa ca yaa vaacaa, eta.m ma"ngalamuttama.m..
text.72: [21] ``gaaravo ^a^V0.0005^ea^ ca nivaato ca, santu.t.thi ca kata~n~nutaa.
text.73: [22] kaalena dhammassavana.m {dhammassaava.na.m (ka0 sii0), dhammasavana.m (ka0 sii0)}, eta.m ma"ngalamuttama.m..
text.85: [22] sabbattha sotthi.m gacchanti, ta.m tesa.m ma"ngalamuttama''nti..
text.89: [21] yaaniidha ^a^T0.0005^ea^  bhuutaani samaagataani, bhummaani {bhuumaani (ka0)} vaa yaani va  antalikkhe.
text.90: [22] sabbeva bhuutaa sumanaa bhavantu, athopi sakkacca su.nantu  bhaasita.m..
text.92: [21] tasmaa ^a^M0.0005^ea^ hi bhuutaa nisaametha sabbe, metta.m karotha  maanusiyaa pajaaya.
text.93: [22] divaa ca ratto ca haranti ye bali.m, tasmaa hi ne  rakkhatha appamattaa..
text.95: [21] ya.m ki~nci vitta.m idha vaa hura.m vaa, saggesu ^a^P0.0004^ea^  vaa ya.m ratana.m pa.niita.m.
text.96: [27] na no sama.m atthi tathaagatena, idampi buddhe ratana.m  pa.niita.m.
text.99: [21] khaya.m ^a^V0.0006^ea^ viraaga.m amata.m pa.niita.m, yadajjhagaa sakyamunii  samaahito.

author: Not available
originalTitle: Namo Tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammaasambuddhassa: Khuddakanikaaye
